content: i love making these tiny bunny rabbits they make such cute keychains or little gifts equally appreciated by kids and adults alike they are so quick and easy to crochet although the small details can be a bit fiddly to make so if you don t enjoy working on small details you may want to skip this one size 8 cm 3 1/8 from head to toe 12 cm 4 3/4 including straight ears when crocheted with dk weight yarn and a 2 50 mm hook difficulty 2 beginner - suitable for novice crocheters includes small details skills required single_crochet stitch magic_ring 1 crocheting in spiral 2 increasing 3 decreasing 4 finishing and joining pieces 5 copyright © 2013-2016 tü spire all rights reserved please do not post this pattern to your website or blog instead post a link to https //kristitullus com/blogs/news/free-pattern-tiny-bunnies you may use this pattern as a teaching aid in any free class or e-course or as part of a free crochet pattern provided you credit me as the designer kristi tullus https //kristitullus com feel free to sell items made with this pattern 1 https //kristitullus com/blogs/news/122854727-start-crocheting-in-round-with-a-magic-ring 2 https //kristitullus com/blogs/news/123118727-crocheting-in-spiral 3 https //kristitullus com/blogs/news/124607495-increasing 4 https //kristitullus com/blogs/news/125738439-decreasing 5 https //kristitullus com/pages/tutorials-list-1
